dc_description_s: This polygon shapefile represents village boundaries in Karnataka, India. Points of all villages are shown linked to Primary Census Abstract 2011.This dataset is intended for researchers, students, and policy makers for reference and mapping purposes, and may be used for village level demographic analysis within basic applications to support graphical overlays and analysis with other spatial data.
